DataElement.preferredName: Self-Report Seizure Past 7 Day Occurrence Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical response that indicates the number of seizures a patient reports that have occurred within the past 7 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information._Sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin._Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Property.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Value expressed as a number with 3 total digits and no decimals.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:No Value Exists:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
